movies.title: Lingaa
movies.plot: Lingaa is an upcoming Tamil action thriller film being directed by K. S. Ravikumar, who also scripted the film in collaboration with the film's dialogue writer, Pon Kumaran. The film stars Rajinikanth playing dual role, Jagapati Babu, Anushka Shetty and Sonakshi Sinha in the lead roles. Music is being composed by A. R. Rahman while cinematography was headed by R. Rathnavelu. This is slated to get released only in Tamil, Telugu and Hindi language.
movies.simplePlot: A small-time thief reforms after learning about the role played by his grandfather in building a dam.

biography.bio: Rajinikanth has been a megastar in the Tamil movie industry since the 70s. He is one of the highest earning actors in Asia. He has also worked in Hindi, Telugu, Kannada, and English movies. He was born in Bangalore (India), and was employed as a bus conductor before he joined the Madras Film Institute. He made his debut in _Katha Sangama (1975)_ and became a star with _Apoorva Raagangal (1975)_ . His unique acting style is characterized by a trademark gesture: flipping a cigarette in the air and catching it in his mouth. His fans conduct poojas on huge cutouts of Rajnikant just before the launching of his films to ensure his success. His fans collect opening day ticket stubs of his movies and even buy them at exorbitant prices. Directors cannot 'kill off' his character in the movie for fear that the theatre will be burnt down to prevent future runnings of the movie by his 'crazed' fans who consider him almost a god. He is said to "explode like a tiger on screen".
biography.name: Rajinikanth

biography.bio: Anushka Shetty is an Indian Film Actress. She was also a Yoga Instructor and has trained under yoga guru Bharat Thakur. This tall and gorgeous beauty debuted in the 2005 Telugu film Super starring Nagarjuna which was super hit at box office. Later her performance in Vikramarkudu make her noticeable. But in Arundhati in which she had played the role of Jejamma, she got high critical acclaim and become one of the strong actress of Telugu Film Industry.
biography.name: Anushka Shetty

biography.bio: She is the daughter of legendary Indian actor Shatrughan Sinha and Poonam Sinha and sister to Luv Sinha and Kussh Sinha. She started her career as a model and walked the ramp in the Lakme Fashion week in 2008. She got her break in movies after being signed up by Salman Khan for his thriller Dabangg (2010)
biography.name: Sonakshi Sinha

biography.bio: Jagapathi Babu is an actor, known for Pulimurugan (2016), Nannaku Prematho (2016) and Bachchan (2013).
biography.name: Jagapathi Babu

biography.bio: Dev Gill is an actor, known for Magadheera (2009), Lingaa (2014) and Bhaag Milkha Bhaag (2013).
biography.name: Dev Gill

biography.bio: Santhanam is a Tamil film actor, who began acting in films, debuting in 'Pesatha Kannum Pesume' in a small role. After the success of the Lollu Sabha he re-entered in to the Tamil films in Manmadhan (2004) alongside Silambarasan Rajendar and later acted alongside the Tamil film industry's top stars, including Rajinikanth, Vijay, Ajith, Surya Sivakumar, Karthi Sivakumar, Jayam Ravi, Arya, and countless others, as well as multiple films with Silambarasan. He played the lead role in Arai Enn 305-il Kadavul (2008), along with Prakash Raj. Unlike veteran comedians like Vadivelu and Vivek, who usually act in a comedy track separate from the main plot, Santhanam plays the role of the hero's friend (and sometimes, foil), contributing more to the actual story. He won the Vijay Award for Best Comedian in 2010 for his role in Siva Manasula Sakthi (2009). He received wide praise for his roles in films directed by M. Rajesh, such as Siva Manasula Sakthi (2009) and Boss Engira Baskaran (2010).
biography.name: Santhanam

biography.bio: Karunakaran is an actor and writer, known for Jigarthanda (2014), Pizza (2012) and Micmac Masters (2013).
biography.name: Karunakaran

biography.placeOfBirth: Mullapoodi, Guntur district, Andhra Pradesh, India
biography.bio: Considered as the greatest comedian Telugu film industry ever produced Brahamanandam is a native of Muppala village near Sattenapalli, Brahmanandam completed his M.A (Telugu) and worked as a Lecturer in Telugu before Jandhyala introduced him to the silver screen with a role in the movie 'Chantabbayi.' Much before that, he won the Best Supporting Actor in an Inter Collegiate Competitions in Narasaraopet in 1968 and won the fancy dress competition award for portraying the character of 'Modabbayi.' After a brief hiatus, he was given a role by D. Ramanaidu in 'Ahana Pellanta' and Brahamanandam never looked back.
biography.name: Brahmanandam

biography.bio: Radha Ravi is known for his work on Micmac Masters (2013), Saala Khadoos (2016) and Singam (2010).
biography.name: Radha Ravi

biography.bio: Vijayakumar is an actor, known for Baasha (1995), Agni Natchathiram (1988) and Kizhakku Seemayile (1993). He is married to Manjula.
biography.name: Vijayakumar

biography.placeOfBirth: Peddapulivarru, Guntur District, Andhra Pradesh, India
biography.bio: K. Viswanath was born on February 19, 1930 in Peddapulivarru, Guntur District, Andhra Pradesh, India as Kaasinathuni Viswanath. He is a director and writer, known for Aapathbandavudu (1992), Eeshwar (1989) and Swayam Krushi (1987).
biography.name: K. Viswanath

biography.bio: Nizhalgal Ravi is an actor, known for Nayakan (1987), Gori Tere Pyaar Mein (2013) and Hindustani (1996).
biography.name: Nizhalgal Ravi

biography.bio: R. Sundarajan is an actor and director, known for Raajadhi Raaja (1989), Vaidehi Kaathirundaal (1984) and Mela Thiranthathu Kadhavu (1986).
biography.name: R. Sundarajan

biography.bio: Manobala is an actor and director, known for Ghajini (2005), Pithamagan (2003) and Nanban: Mon Pote (2012).
biography.name: Manobala

biography.bio: Balaji is an actor, known for Vaali (1999), Mozhi (2007) and Dheena (2001).
biography.name: Balaji
